definition[0]: if you get or are given the chop, you lose your job
example[0]: Six more staff got the chop last week.
example[1]: I might be for the chop (=lose my job).
definition[1]: if something gets or is given the chop, it is closed or stopped because people do not want to pay for it anymore
example[2]: The project might get the chop.
example[3]: This factory might now be for the chop (=likely to be closed).
